title: Old house at land value
details:
The perfect plot of land for your business or residence with a commercial and residential neighborhood, conveniently located in the heart of the city.

This land consist of 6 perches with an old house that could be used with major modification.. Suitable location, also being an ideal investment for a brighter future.

Easy access to both Maradana and Borella. Schools, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants and other basic amenities within close range.

Enjoy life to the fullest in your dream home.

Call Linea Property for more inquiries.
